thought: The first step is to open an empty document. Notepad++ starts with an empty document by default, so I can skip this step. The next step is to open the Find dialog (ctrl+f).
The next step in the bug report is to press the 'Find All in Current Document' button. I need to locate this button in the parsed UI content and click it.
The previous action was a failure. I need to correct the action and click the 'Find All in Current Document' button. I will move the mouse to the correct button and click it.
The next step is to open the menu Search->Next Search Result. This requires opening the Search menu first, then clicking on 'Next Search Result'.
Now that the 'Search' menu is open, I need to click on 'Next Search Result' to complete the reproduction steps. I will move the mouse to the 'Next Search Result' menu item and click it.
